post:
More excellent news from Bandwagon Host!

You asked - we delivered, again! We have increased our footprint in PhoenixNAP DC and now we offer even more storage and more data transfer than ever!

Two new plans, available only in Phoenix:

[10G plan: $11.99/year 512MB RAM 10.0GB SSD 1000GB monthly transfer on GigE 1 IPv4](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=27)

[20G plan: $18.99/year 1024MB RAM 20.0GB SSD 2000GB monthly transfer on GigE 1 IPv4](https://bandwagonhost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=28)

Enjoy!
